description: On Tuesday, François Molins, a French prosecutor, described an attack on a high-speed train as terrorism and dismissed the suspect’s “fantastical” assertion that he intended it only as a robbery.
title: French Prosecutor Discusses Train Attack
title_page: French Prosecutor Discusses Train Attack - Video - NYTimes.com
text: On Tuesday, François Molins, a French prosecutor, described an attack on a high-speed train as terrorism and dismissed the suspect’s “fantastical” assertion that he intended it only as a robbery.
